features.featureDescription: Service supports disabling public network access either through using service-level IP ACL filtering rule (not NSG or Azure Firewall) or using a 'Disable Public Network Access' toggle switch.
features.featureGuidance: Disable public network access by using Logic Apps Standard in ASE v3 or a workflow Standard app service plan. With ASE v3, customers can configure to choose an internal ASE V3. With a regular workflow standard app service plan, customers can disable the public network access with private endpoints enabled.
features.customerActionsDescription: Secure cloud native services with network controls

features.featureDescription: Service native IP filtering capability for filtering network traffic (not to be confused with NSG or Azure Firewall).
features.featureGuidance: Deploy the Logic Apps Standard application into any of the Workflow Standard ASPs or ASE V3 based ASPs. Customers can configure VNET integration and private endpoints with both of the above suggested options.
features.customerActionsDescription: Secure cloud native services with network controls
